overview: Fuck your battle buddy like your life depended on it - it does! Director Rolf Hammerschmidt brings you an iron-hard Euro-hunk cast of 8 battle hardened buddies. They train and fight hard -and fuck hard too. Four intense sucking and fucking duo scenes - military duty and hard fought battle brings men together in many ways! There`s a lot to be said for comraderie!
tagline: Fuck your battle buddy like your life depended on it - it does!
title: Battle Fuckers
